Changelog
v1.4.0 - Ability to change Flash Player names. - In making the internet a better place, all analytics tracking has been removed.
v1.3.1 - Added more Growl notifications. - Containing directory is now also deleted when deleting plugins from the storage.
v1.3.0 - Growl (v1.3) notifications added (issue #17). - Improved Alert handling (issue #18).
v1.2.2 - Layout fix when having no active Flash Player plugin (issue #19). - Now checks system installed plugin after activating app as well. - Updated the Help.
v1.2.1 - Fixed DockIcon menu version info when no user plugin was installed. - Show system player version when no user plugin is installed (issue #16).
v1.2.0 - Fixed storing plugins with a custom storage path. - Compacted listing of stored plugins by grouping release and debugger based on version. - Ability to select and download multiple plugins in one go. - Added localization (English and Dutch for the moment, awaiting more translations). - Ability to disable editing of storage (useful for managed storage). - Ability to activate a plugin from the Dock icon. - New application icon (by Igor van Oostveen). - Added FDT5 logo and link as Powerflasher sponsered a FDT5 Max license :).
v1.1.0 - Storage location for database and plugins can now be chosen. - Better positioning of Help window. - Text changes. - Added Help menu with links to the help and issue list. - Rechecks installed versions when application is activated.
v1.0.1 - Multiple Help windows issue fixed.
v1.0.0 - All basic stuff is in. - Help added. - Added alert when removing user plugin.
v0.9.1 - Download progress when adding plugins. - Visual feedback in downloadable plugin list.
v0.9.0 - Added ability to download plugins into the storage. (visuals like progres bars etc aren't in yet)
v0.8.5 - Added an alert when deleting a plugin from the storage. - Added an alert after installing a plugin.
v0.8.4 - Added ability to delete installed plugins.
v0.8.3 - First public release.
